name: ThreatConnect IOC Submission
description: Polarity integration that connects to the ThreatConnect threat intelligence platform using the IOC Submission interface format.

options.name: ThreatConnect API URL
options.description: The API URL of your ThreatConnect instance to include the schema (i.e., https://) and port if applicable

options.name: Access ID
options.description: Account Identifier that is associated with the API Key

options.name: API Key
options.description: The API (secret) Key associated with the provided Access ID

options.name: Allow IOC Deletion
options.description: If checked, users will be able to delete indicators from ThreatConnect.

options.name: Allow Group Association
options.description: If checked, users will be able to Associate Indicators with Groups from ThreatConnect.
